file_content.text: Go, Jedi. I shall catch my breath, then continue searching for Hallow Voice.
The Esh-kha who attacked me were sent by the other, Commander Geland. His lies are manipulating them.
Thanks to these Esh-kha, Commander Geland knows where Hallow Voice's followers are held. He will soon strike.
I am close to locating Hallow Voice's chamber, but first his followers--your future army--must be saved. Or the other will destroy them.
They have my lightsaber, and all the strength I can muster.
I won't let them down.
Just tell me where they are.
As soon as they're safe, Commander Geland's life is mine.
Geland will suffer for this.
These stasis chambers belong to Hallow Voice's followers. Go. Save them, quickly. And beware the other.
Thank you. This shield can only withstand so much violence.
I am Lhunu. I have done my best to help you. And yes, I am Rakata.
Your actions are what matter, not your species.
Rakata or not, you helped me.
An enlightened response.
I thought the Rakata were wiped out by plague, and rebelling slaves.
Aren't they extinct?
You Rakata were corrupted by the dark side. You became cannibals, slavers.
The Rakata are evil.
It pains me, but you are not entirely wrong.
Some of us stayed hidden, here and elsewhere, to undo the damage we caused. The imprisonment of the Esh-kha shames my entire race.
Good. Thousands of hunters with points erased. Is unspeakable crime!
The Esh-kha were a genuine threat. But Hallow Voice and his followers were not. They deserve a second chance.
Correcting such an injustice is a rare privilege.
It's an honor to help you.
Hallow Voice shouldn't be kept waiting any longer.
Then let's hurry.
You're only helping me to ease your conscience.
So this is about your guilt.
Accept my reasons or do not, but decide quickly.
Commander Geland was searching for a master key. Could it help us?
What about the "master key"?
Ah. The master key controls the defenses deep below. His Esh-kha must have spoken of it.
The key would make Commander Geland's control of the prison absolute. I will investigate, while you aid Hallow Voice's people.
